Reference

All functions

axis_fun()

Helper function for axis labels using base plotting

biweek.period()

Biweekly Period during Water Year

cond.to.spc()

Converts conductance to specific conductivity

cfs.to.m3d()

Random conversion helpers

cv.per()

Coefficient of variation

dat.interp()

Nutrient Load: Linearly interpolates data to conduct nutrient load calculations

date_fun()

Date function to convert character/other as.POSIXct to date.

DBHYDRO.meta.byDBKEY()

South Florida Water Management District online database (DBHYDRO) metadata

DBHYDRO.meta.bysite()

South Florida Water Management District online database (DBHYDRO) metadata

DBHYDRO_breakpoint()

Data retrieval from South Florida Water Management District online database (DBHYDRO)

DBHYDRO_daily()

Data retrieval from South Florida Water Management District online database (DBHYDRO)

DBHYDRO_WQ()

Data retrieval from South Florida Water Management District online database (DBHYDRO)

decimal.WY()

Decimal water year from a date field

DO.Screening()

Function to screen dissolved oxygen data within the Everglades Ecosystem prior to evaluating compliance with established water quality standards.

DO.TOD.WQS.stream()

Florida Department of Environmental Protection Time-of-day dissolved oxygen water quality criteria

DO_PerSat()

Calculates dissolved oxygen percent saturation from concentration.

dst.to.est()

converts Eastern Daylight Saving time (EDT) to Eastern Standard Time (EST)

dunn.letters()

Plotting helper function to add letters indicating statistically similar parings.

ecdf_fun()

eCDF with confidence intervals

errorbars()

Errorbars to be used with base plotting

FL.Hydroseason()

A function to return the wet/dry hydrologic season specific to south Florida

Folder.Maker()

Function to make folders within working directory.

hydro.day()

Day of Water Year

insight_fetch_daily()

Hydrologic and continuous data retrieval from South Florida Water Management District online database (DBHYDRO)

insight_fetch_ref()

DBHydro Insights reference tables

insight_fetch_wq()

Water Quality Data retrieval from South Florida Water Management District online database (DBHYDRO)

leg.fun()

Continuous or categorical legend

Load.Calc.kg()

Nutrient Load: Calculates load from discharge and concentration data

log(<scale.fun>)

Generate Log-base 10 sequence of values to be used in conjunction with axis_fun when plotting log data

model_fit_params()

Model fit evaluation

N()

Returns sample size

plot(<windrose>)

Plot a windrose Object

pt_error()

Point with error bars

pt_line()

Base plotting helper function.

pt_line_error()

Point with error bars

qq.function()

Calculation of theortical quantile (Quantile-Quantile Plot)

read.access()

Data retrievial from South Florida Water Management District online database (DBHYDRO)

ref_table_name

A list of reference table names for use with insight_fetch_ref

SalinityCalc()

Calculates salinity from Specific Conductance and Temperature data

SE()

Calcualtes standard error

shaded.range()

Base plotting helper function to draw a shaded polygon

stickplot.dat.arrows()

windspeed and direction helper functions for base plotting

st_txt()

Add text to map like raster::text()

summary(<windrose>)

Summarize a windrose Object

thessian_create()

GIS Function to create thessian polygons from spatial points.

TN_Combine()

Nitrogen concentration data handling

windrose()

Create a windrose Object

Determines Water Year from a date field
